cbVIn

public float cbVIn(int boardNum,
                   int chan,
                   int gain,
                   float dataValue,
                   int options)
This method read data from the Analog/Digital converter.

Parameters:
boardNum - board number of the analog digital converter.
chan - channel number.
gain - channel gain.
dataValue - data value.
options - Options.
Returns:
read data value.

cbVOut

public float cbVOut(int boardNum,
                    int chan,
                    int gain,
                    float dataValue,
                    int options)
This method writes data in the Analog/Digital converter.

Parameters:
boardNum - board number of the analog digital converter.
chan - channel number.
gain - channel gain.
dataValue - data value.
options - Options
Returns:
the written data value.
